A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Let me start by saying that I am not a hardcore Star Wars fanboy and I've only followed Star Wars through the the major films.  I'm reviewing this movie based only one viewing and I have to say I left the theater feeling somewhat disappointed and empty.  I didn't feel the force with this one.  Without spoiling the movie\, overall I felt the movie lacked depth in character development for the main characters\, and focused too much on support characters.  A lot of scenes felt cut off short and plot development  felt forced\, unnatural\, and inconsequential.  Now without a doubt there were some very memorable and beautiful scenes in this movie\, but overall they felt fleeting.  The good parts of the story that actually felt fitting as a sequel to The Force Awakens and Star Wars story in general seemed to be overtaken and overcast by a side story that I could care less for.
